articles.title: Oropouche virus surge in Brazil: Experts warn of escalating threat - The Indian Express
articles.description: In June, a pregnant woman lost her baby at 30 weeks, and the virus was detected in samples from the umbilical cord and organs.
articles.content: The Oropouche virus, spread by midges and mosquitoes, has seen a dramatic rise in Brazil this year, with 7,284 cases reported, up from 832 in 2023. This sharp increase is raising alarms among experts… [+2704 chars]

articles.title: After Wayanad Tragedy, Centre Moves Draft to Declare 57,000 Sq Km of Western Ghats Eco-Sensitive | Exclusiv - News18
articles.description: News18 has exclusively accessed this detailed draft notification issued by the Centre on July 31, which proposed declaring nearly 36% of Western Ghats as eco-sensitive. The area includes 13 villages in Wayanad and around 10,000 sq km in the state of Kerala
articles.content: In the aftermath of the Wayanad tragedy, the Centre has issued a draft notification to declare around 57,000 square kilometer (sq km) of Western Ghats as an ecologically-sensitive area. The area incl… [+5336 chars]

articles.author: A Ksheerasagar
articles.title: Nifty 50 snaps longest weekly winning run since 2010 with 0.5% drop, 30 stocks end in the red | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Nifty 50 ended today’s session with a drop of 1.7%, closing at 24,717 points, resulting in a weekly decline of 0.50%. This marks the first weekly drop for the index after eight consecutive weeks of gains, with 30 stocks ending the week in the red.
articles.content: The longest weekly winning streak since 2010 came to an end this week as the Indian market faced significant selling pressure today. This downturn was influenced by a sell-off in global markets follo… [+4564 chars]
